author: jianyunt
body: @HemantMahawar @BrucePay  please review the changes for the Get PowerShell table. thx

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
This PR has conflicts with #1387
We have 20 open PRs, most of them about docs.

That's not good - people will have a bunch of conflicts.

comments.author: alexandair
vors
comments.body: @jianyunt do you plan to review these PRs?

comments.author: vors
alexandair
comments.body:
@vors OK. Sometimes even when lines are short they contain more then one sentence. I correct those.
Also, a few times I've reformatted a line to break on a "," or ";". I know it doesn't affect the rendered text, but it's easier to read markdown text.

title: Updated the Get PowerShell table
